# Training Description

The training serves as an introduction to \textbf{R} programming language as a tool for data management and analysis of public health data. In particular: 

- data exploration
- data cleaning
- data munging 
- data analysis 
- data visualization

# Expected outcomes

- Become familiar with R 
- Be able to load, clean, transform, summarize and visualize data
- Produce meaningful data insights
- Automate R processes and analysis
